#summary Building XBird binaries from the source distribution
#labels Phase-Implementation,Phase-Deploy

== Purpose ==

This how-to is aimed at developers who want to compile XBird from the source distribution or from a Subversion checkout.

== Steps == 

{{{
ant makeall
}}}

That's all :-). See [http://code.google.com/p/xbird/source/browse/trunk/xbird-open/build.xml build.xml] for detail.
